page.title: 07ULLAPOOL FAMILIES.
page.content: KERRY - On a Saturday afternoon I go to the swing park with my friends. KENNETH - After lunch I go to the football pitch to watch the older men play. PETER - I work with Dad carrying bricks and making cement. JOCELYN - My Mum and Dad have a Guest House. JOANNE - I sometimes go fishing or pony-trekking. CRAIG - We sometimes go out on a boat from the pier. DONNA - After breakfast I go out skating on my roller-boots. MICHAEL - My Dad gives me between 50p. and Â£1.00 pocket money. MARGARET - Sunday is the best because we can go out and buy ice-cream. DONNA - On Sunday we go to church from 11 am.to 12.30 pm.and 6 pm.to 7.30 pm.
